attributes.action: Allow learners drivers in England to practice driving during third lockdown
attributes.background: In Wales and Scotland people are allowed to practice there driving as long as it is part of there essential journey. I believe it should be the same in England. My test has now been moved for a third time to March 2021 and need this practice to pass once everything is allowed to continue.

rejection.details:
Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Allow learner drivers to go out and drive with people from their household: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063
